First time talking: I sure hope you're not here to arrest me. I'm just an outside contractor.
As long as you pay your taxes, I don't care who you are.
In that case, I'm called Patchwork Gary. I sell access to arcane powers in the form of magical patches.
Would you be interested in purchasing some?
Hello there! I see those fools with hammers haven't managed to squash you yet.
I have some interesting patches if you're in the market for 'em. Care to take a look?
Hello Agent. I see you were able to defeat the head of IT.
Yes. Do you by chance happen to know how he got his powers?
Of course I do. The CEO bought our Gold Tier Management Bundle, powers for you and up to 4 subordinates for no additional cost.
Don't give me that look, Agent. There are no laws prohibiting the sale of arcane powers.
True. However, you will strip all remaining employees of their powers or I will arrest you for interfering with my investigation.
No can do. Once I sell someone powers, I can't do anything to remove them. Also, I doubt the IRS wants to end up in court with the organization I work for.
Anyways. I have a new set of Patches for sale, if you want to take a look.
Take a look at my wares. See if there's anything that interests you.
You wouldn't happen to have anything to help deal with the cold would you?
Unfortunately not. You may want to go searching for the thermostat. That cold is brutal.
I assume you have more Patches for sale?
Was it you that turned off the AC?
Thank you friend, that was getting downright unbearable.
I'd be careful though, I hear the Head of Accounting doesn't like it when people touch the thermostat.
I think I can handle it.
